text: Wheels on Meals is a 1984 Hong Kong action comedy movie directed by Sammo Hung (who also stars) and starring Jackie Chan, Yuen Biao, Lola Forner, Benny Urquidez, Keith Vitali, Herb Edelman. It was distributed by Golden Harvest. ==Other websites== * * Category:1984 comedy movies Category:1984 action movies Category:Hong Kong comedy movies Category:Hong Kong action movies Category:Movies directed by Sammo Hung Category:Golden Harvest movies
title: Wheels on Meals
